author: Special Correspondent
text:
Posing as customers, a gang of four stole a gold bracelet and a pair of earrings from a jewellery showroom in UB City.

The gang, led by a woman, came in a car. They entered Dinani Jewels and asked a sales girl at the counter to show them the latest collection.

Designs

After checking many designs, the group showed interest in a tray containing a bracelet and a pair of earrings. They discussed the design and the price of the items with the sales staff. While the woman engaged the sales staff in conversation, the others managed to steal the bracelet and the earrings.

A few minutes later, the gang left saying they did not like the design.

Showcase

The theft came to light when the staff went to put the tray back in the showcase.

They immediately checked the CCTV footage and found that the group had pocketed the jewellery.

The Cubbon Park police said the group was conversing in Hindi but appeared to be locals.

Special team

“We have some leads and a special team has been formed to nab them,” a senior police officer said.
title: Gang steals jewellery from UB City store
